name: Doumon
description: Doumon is a humanoid Digimon with fox -like characteristics. It wears a white onmyÅji robe with vertical plates on the shoulders, the Sanskrit character for "HÅ«á¹ƒ" ( ğ‘–®ğ‘—ğ‘–½ ? ) emblazoned on the front, the yin-yang symbol on the chest and shoulder plates (beneath three black wisps in the latter instance), and black and white triangles on the ends of the sleeves. It also wears baggy black pants, and a tall, black hat. It has white, three-fingered hands and white, three-toed feet with black claws and black paw pads in both instances. It has a blue furred tail with a black tip, and a blue, fox-like face with black markings on its cheeks and forehead and black-tipped ears. It also has black eyes with crimson irises.
